asr.setup.magnetize
===================


.. contents:: Contents
   :local:

Summary
-------

This is the documentation for :py:mod:`asr.setup.magnetize`-recipe.
This recipe is comprised of a single step, namely:

  - :py:func:`asr.setup.magnetize.main`

Run this recipe through the CLI interface

.. code-block:: console

   $ asr run asr.setup.magnetize

or as a python module

.. code-block:: console

   $ python -m asr.setup.magnetize

Detailed description
--------------------
Generate magnetic atomic structures.
